Detailed Description

An abstract base class for all objects that can be part of a 3D world.

Member Function Documentation

void addAnimationTrack ( AnimationTrack *  animation_track  )  [virtual]

Adds the given AnimationTrack to this Object3D, potentially changing the order and indices of the previously added tracks.

Reimplemented in Background, Camera, Fog, Light, Material, MorphingMesh, Node, Sprite3D, Texture2D, Transformable, and VertexBuffer.

int animate ( int  world_time  )  [virtual]

Updates all animated properties in this Object3D and all Object3Ds that are reachable from this Object3D.

Reimplemented in Appearance, Background, Camera, Fog, Light, Material, Mesh, MorphingMesh, Node, Sprite3D, Texture2D, Transformable, VertexBuffer, and World.
